message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're making a serious effort to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I'm not going any lower than that. Let me know if that's a price you're comfortable with.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $107.50. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one last push to meet you in the middle. I'll meet you at $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
